selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Calculate the total cost of beads using the given weights and prices.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use calc_numeric to compute the total cost by multiplying the weights of the beads by their respective prices and summing the results.

new_skill_specs.name: extract_prices_from_image
new_skill_specs.purpose: Extract the prices per kilogram for different types of beads from an image.
new_skill_specs.outputs: A dictionary with bead types as keys and their prices as values.
edge_cases: Image is blurry or text is unclear
Prices are not in expected format
